name: Silver Sorcery
description:
You're a ranger in the Wild Wizard West, tasked to find out what happened to a town suddenly overrun with werewolves. Take your silver-slinging sidearm and get ready for waves of monster mutts as they swarm over the newest item on the menu: you!

Controls:
W = Up
S = Down
A = Left
D = Right
R = Reload
Shift = Slide-dodge
Left Mouse Button = Fire

Aim with mouse. Pick up upgrades after each round. Game gets more difficult after surviving each round, with more werewolves spawning over time.

--
This is our first short game made together and published here. We hope you enjoy it as much as we did making it. Depending on feedback, we might do more with this game, or we might make more games like it! Thanks for checking us out ;)
